revisionDesc.change: Finalized - This is good to go.
Finalized - This is good to go.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - TEXT: delete extra spaces between brackets; punctuate as in TLG; fr. 1.i.2 >> lost.1lin; correct line breaks; 1.i.7 >> οὔτε (x2); 1.i.8 final sigma is not inside the square brackets; regularize in 1.i.10; 1.ii add line breaks; 1.ii.18 place final ou in square brackets and add lenis; add lenis in 1.ii.19; 2.ii.55-56 >> lost.2lin; 3.i.64 >> ὑστε; regularize in 3.i.68; in 3.ii.1 and ii.2 there is .1 before [.11]; in 3.ii.74 >> regularize τ̣ὴ̣[ν] (so also in 79); add number tag in 3.ii.76 and 78 (x2); end of 80 is .1 not .?; Δι’ | οὗ at 81-82; regularize in fr. 3.iii.85; add lenis to end of 86; [.2]ν at start of 3.iii.91; at fr. 6.ii.113 encode lost.8lin; at fr. 7.127 encode lost.1-2lin; regularize in fr. 8.134; encode lost.1lin at fr. 11.157; at 166 it’s ἠγώ̣νιστα̣[ι; encode lost.1lin at 170. META: add 70156, 70953, 64994, 39444, 35115 as studies; Ankyropolis is (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736888); Lysias is CWKB 959; mp3 is 01294.000;

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - TEXT: delete extra spaces between brackets; punctuate as in TLG; fr. 1.i.2 >> lost.1lin; correct line breaks; 1.i.7 >> οὔτε (x2); 1.i.8 final sigma is not inside the square brackets; regularize in 1.i.10; 1.ii add line breaks; 1.ii.18 place final ou in square brackets and add lenis; add lenis in 1.ii.19; 2.ii.55-56 >> lost.2lin; 3.i.64 >> ὑστε; regularize in 3.i.68; in 3.ii.1 and ii.2 there is .1 before [.11]; in 3.ii.74 >> regularize τ̣ὴ̣[ν] (so also in 79); add number tag in 3.ii.76 and 78 (x2); end of 80 is .1 not .?; Δι’ | οὗ at 81-82; regularize in fr. 3.iii.85; add lenis to end of 86; [.2]ν at start of 3.iii.91; at fr. 6.ii.113 encode lost.8lin; at fr. 7.127 encode lost.1-2lin; regularize in fr. 8.134; encode lost.1lin at fr. 11.157; at 166 it’s ἠγώ̣νιστα̣[ι; encode lost.1lin at 170.
